description: Barracuda®Green hard drives from Seagate®save you time.  The fastest green drive performance enabled by the industries only 5900 RPM spin speed means the fastest data throughput of and "green" drive on the market. SmartAlign technology means you get the benefits of the new Advanced Format 4K sector standard without the hassles of software alignment utilities required by other drives. SmartAlign makes Seagate Advanced Format hard drives look and act just like they always have. With Barracuda Green you get fast performance, cool quite operation and no-hassle integration. It's the green power drive that won't slow you down.
title: Seagate Barracuda Green 1.5TB 5900RPM SATA 6Gb/s 64MB Cache 3.5 Inch Internal Hard Drive ST1500DL003- Bare Drive
